Author: DelicateFknFlower
Text: ED thoughts are invasive and corrosive, and boy when they come they're fucking persistent and refuse to leave. we can't change what they say, we can only hold onto the glimmer of hope that they're not real. no matter how hard it is. sending love and strength x

Author: bumandu
Text: Listen, I've been saying this for the last couple days as if I was trying to get it inside my head but it is because I know it's true. Our minds and tricky and evil. That's it. And the more you think about the things your mind is telling you the more you start to believe them.   Don't apologize, we've all been negative at least once, you just have to start believing that you are not those things your mind is telling you. You are beautiful, you are complete, you are perfect the way you are.
